item.description:
Hi, all, according to feedbacks I received here, I would like to set up our
first members introduction & network event. in order to coordinate different time schedule,
this event will hold monthly (Basically every FEB/APRIL/JUNE/AUG/OCT/DEC on THURSDAY of end of month & JAN/MAR/MAY/JULY/SEP/NOV on FRIDAY of end of month)
some members suggested the place better hold in boston, I'll definitely consider for it, if we could find free place that meet our requirement.

the following is detailed time schedule for next meet up.

6:00PM- 6:30 PM
open networking simple snack coffee or tea provided.

6:30PM- 7:00 PM
(Meeting called to order and individual introductions to group
- you can choose introduce yourself OR
- choose introduce each other if you already talked with one person during open
networking session)

7:00PM - 7:15PM
open discussion or experience introduction on Japanese learning (what book, or tape or DVD or dictionary, learning method anything as long as you think help learning Japanese.

7:15PM - 7:30PM
English as a second language people, what was ( or is) the biggest difficulty do you have to face, what was your solution. Any suggestions may help new comer?

7:30 PM - 7:45PM
As native American, or Japanese as third or forth language, each person may have different reason want learn Japanese, what do you know about Japan so far, and what?s field is your interest about Japan?

7:45PM- 8:00PM
further free discussion in the previous topic, and ask for opinion for the event, and any improvement or new suggestion on the next event.

NOTE:
*** If any person wannt name tag, Please E-MAIL to carolinexuan@vip.sina.com
your full name before AUG 26.
*** Free parking space is available
item.name: Members introduction & network
